{icon}
break case 'n': icon = square =

break case 'b': icon = square =
{icon}
break case 'r': icon = square =
{icon}
break case 'q': icon = square =

break case 'k': icon = square =

break } if (tile.type === "P") icon = else if (tile.type === "Knight") icon = else if (tile.type === "Bishop") icon = else if (tile.type === "Rook") icon = else if (tile.type === "Queen") icon = else if (tile.type === "King") icon = return (

); } }
